com.github.sanity4j.util.math

Class InfixExpression

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.sanity4j.util.math.InfixExpression

  • public final class InfixExpression
extends java.lang.Object
    Infix expression evaluator - evaluates infix expressions like "(12.34-(2+3.3)*4/3)^2" Variables can be used, prefix them with a '#'. The infix expression is parsed and processed in postfix form.
    Version:
    1.0 02/01/2008
    Author:
    Yiannis Paschalidis

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors

      Creates an InfixExpression with the given expression.

      • evaluateInfix

        public static double evaluateInfix(java.lang.String expression)
                            throws SyntaxException
        Evaluate an infix expression by first parsing it to postfix form, then evaluating the postfix.
        Parameters:
        expression - - the string to evaluate
        Returns:
        the evaluated expression
        Throws:

      • parseInfixToPostfix

        public static java.lang.String[] parseInfixToPostfix(java.lang.String inval)
                                              throws SyntaxException
        Parse an infix expression.
        Parameters:
        inval - - the infix expression to be parsed
        Returns:
        a String array containing numbers & operands as strings, in postfix evaluation order
        Throws:
        SyntaxException - Thrown if a problem occurs.
